thread.title: Formula One: Fernando Alonso confirms he will stay at McLaren

author: newsr.in
title: Formula One: Fernando Alonso confirms he will stay at McLaren
text: *Sochi, Russia:* Fernando Alonso on Thursday made light of his frustrations with the struggling McLaren Honda team and confirmed he plans to stay with the team next year and through 2017. He said his widely broadcast radio messages, in which he criticised the performance of his car's Honda engine during the Japanese Grand Prix, ... Â»
